verses.verse: Let him <S%H5401>kiss<s%> me with the <S%H5390>kisses<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: for your <S%H1730>love<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H3196>wine<s%>.

Because of the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of your <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8081>ointments<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> is as <S%H8081>ointment<s%> poured <S%H7324>forth<s%>, therefore do the <S%H5959>virgins<s%> love <S%H157>you<s%>.

<S%H4900>Draw<s%> <S%H7323>me<s%>, we will run <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4428>you<s%>: the king has <S%H935>brought<s%> me into his <S%H2315>chambers<s%>: we will be <S%H1523>glad<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in <S%H2142>you<s%>, we will remember your <S%H1730>love<s%> more than <S%H3196>wine<s%>: the <S%H4339>upright<s%> love <S%H157>you<s%>.

I am <S%H7838>black<s%>, but <S%H5000>fitting<s%>, O you <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, as the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%>, as the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>.

<S%H7200>Look<s%> not upon <S%H7840>me<s%>, because I am black, because the <S%H8121>sun<s%> has <S%H7805>looked<s%> upon <S%H517>me<s%>: my mother's <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H2787>angry<s%> with <S%H7760>me<s%>; they made me the <S%H5201>keeper<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>; but my own <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> have I not <S%H5201>kept<s%>.

<S%H5046>Tell<s%> <S%H5315>me<s%>, O you whom my soul <S%H157>loves<s%>, where you <S%H7462>feed<s%>, <S%H349>where<s%> you make your flock to <S%H7257>rest<s%> at <S%H6672>noon<s%>: <S%H4100>for<s%> why should I be as one that turns <S%H5844>aside<s%> by the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of your <S%H2270>companions<s%>?

If you <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3303>not<s%>, O you fairest among <S%H802>women<s%>, go your way <S%H3318>forth<s%> by the <S%H6119>footsteps<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>, and <S%H7462>feed<s%> your <S%H1429>kids<s%> beside the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>' <S%H4908>tents<s%>.
I have <S%H1819>compared<s%> <S%H7474>you<s%>, O my love, to a company of <S%H5484>horses<s%> in <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H7393>chariots<s%>.
Your <S%H3895>cheeks<s%> are <S%H4998>fitting<s%> with <S%H8447>rows<s%> of <S%H6677>jewels<s%>, your neck with chains of <S%H2737>gold<s%>.
We will <S%H6213>make<s%> you <S%H8447>borders<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> with <S%H5351>studs<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.
While the <S%H4428>king<s%> sits at his <S%H4524>table<s%>, my <S%H5373>spikenard<s%> sends <S%H5414>forth<s%> the smell <S%H7381>there<s%>.
A <S%H6872>bundle<s%> of <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> is my <S%H1730>wellbeloved<s%> unto <S%H3885>me<s%>; he shall lie all night between my <S%H7699>breasts<s%>.
My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is unto me as a <S%H811>cluster<s%> of <S%H3724>camphire<s%> in the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> of <S%H5872>Enâ€“gedi<s%>.
<S%H3303>Behold<s%>, you are fair, my <S%H7474>love<s%>; <S%H3303>behold<s%>, you are fair; you have <S%H3123>doves<s%>' <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
<S%H3303>Behold<s%>, you are fair, my <S%H1730>beloved<s%>, <S%H5273>Yes<s%>, pleasant: also our <S%H6210>bed<s%> is <S%H7488>green<s%>.
The <S%H6982>beams<s%> of our <S%H1004>house<s%> are <S%H730>cedar<s%>, and our <S%H7351>rafters<s%> of <S%H1266>fir<s%>.
